description: LLM service, model selection, token tracking, tool registry, prompt building

tool_handlers.implementation: ToolHandlerBinder (10 handlers), Handler delegate on LopenToolDefinition, BindHandler on IToolRegistry
tool_handlers.notes: Handlers: read_spec, read_research, read_plan, update_task_status, get_current_context, log_research, report_progress, verify_task/component/module_completion. Oracle verification enforced before task completion.

oracle_verifier_wiring.implementation: IOracleVerifier wired into ToolHandlerBinder. Verify handlers call VerifyAsync() with evidence/criteria. Auto-pass fallback when oracle unavailable.
oracle_verifier_wiring.tests: ToolHandlerBinderTests (12 new: oracle dispatch pass/fail, fallback, end-to-end with update_task_status)
oracle_verifier_wiring.notes: LLM-06 met. DI registration updated in ServiceCollectionExtensions.cs.

sdk_tool_registration.implementation: ToolConversion static class in Lopen.Llm converts LopenToolDefinition → AIFunction via AIFunctionFactory.Create. CopilotLlmService sets SessionConfig.Tools before session creation.
sdk_tool_registration.notes: CORE-25: Filters null handlers. Maps name/description. Wraps handler delegate for SDK compatibility. Microsoft.Extensions.AI.Abstractions added as explicit dependency.
